channel.title: Custom Client? Custom item need help moving it into client! READ!
channel.description:
I made a few custom items and move it into the client and compiled, everything works good but how do you make it say a different name for the item. For instance, I change Dragon Battleaxe a different look and name, but the name I don't know how to change. In the source I change it but it only shows the new name when your choosing attack styes. But when it's in your bag it still has dragon battleaxe as name, how do I change it to what I want. Someone told me in client, but what file, like Applet_Sub1 or what! there so many and I don't know where, Please help! I asked for help months ago and no one answered me =(
Pleaseee help, Thanks.

item.title: Custom Client? Custom item need help moving it into client! READ!
